You can select fields from the list below that will appear on the grid. Fields with '>' sign indicate reference fields. Clicking reference fields will open that object's field list.
You can drag and drop to reorder fields
You can select fields from the list below to apply condition to . Fields with '>' sign indicate reference fields. Clicking reference fields will open that object's field list.

You can select your preferred operation from the list of available operations as shown
Please select or enter value in the below input box. After clicking the 'Add Condition' the condition will be added to the condition list and will apply if you save it
Clicking on the button will add this condition to the condition list. You can view it in the below table
These conditions will be applied when loading the grid
Here 2 actions are available, EDIT- To edit that particular condition, DELETE- To delete that condition
You can select fields from the below list to apply ordering. Fields with '>' sign indicates a reference field. Clicking reference fields will open that object's field list.

Construct different logical connections among conditions using parentheses and the words 'AND' and 'OR'.
Example of Patterns
1. (1 OR 2) AND 3 2. (1 OR 3) AND (2 OR 4) 3. (2 OR 4) AND ((3 OR 6) AND (5 OR 1))
Once you are done editing the pattern, click outside the input box.
